titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Kings most excellent Maiestie at Woodstocke, Aug. 28. 1614. By William Goodwin, Deane of Christ's Church and Vice-Chancellor of the Vniversity of Oxon. Published by commandement
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, William, d. 1620.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
